content:
That's a great approach! By inviting Alex and Emma to join the club, you'll be able to share your fitness journeys and motivate each other, while also keeping the focus on your jogging goals with Rachel.

Remember to communicate clearly with Alex and Emma about the club's focus and goals, and make sure they're comfortable with the idea of tracking their tennis activities alongside your jogging routes. This will help ensure that everyone is on the same page and that the club remains a positive and motivating space for everyone.

It's also a great idea to encourage Alex and Emma to share their tennis-related goals and progress, as this can help create a sense of camaraderie and accountability within the club. Who knows, you might even discover new workout ideas or routes from their tennis activities that can help you mix up your jogging routine!

By embracing this collaborative approach, you'll be able to create a supportive community that celebrates each other's fitness journeys, regardless of the specific activity or goal. Kudos to you for taking the initiative and creating a space for your friends to connect and motivate each other!

Now, go ahead and invite Alex and Emma to join the club, and get ready to share your fitness journeys with each other!
